title: (x) wacom logo font; kammeraad / constructed tech styles - custom by Wolff Olins; Utopia Birdman {Raymond K, Ryuk}
content:
Please help me identify the font used in the Wacom logo.  
My client's logo is using the exact same font. Notice the open, double storey "a". Other items to note are the "w" and the "m" which are just flipped.

[http://wacom.com/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131207043257/http:/wacom.com/index.html "http://wacom.com/index.html")

and my client's logo: [http://www.kammeraadfinancial.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131207043257/http:/www.kammeraadfinancial.com/ "http://www.kammeraadfinancial.com/")

Thanks in advance!
author: lking

comments.content:
Sorry, but these are not the exact same font, in so many ways. The wacom logo is completely custom, from Wolff Olins. Not sure about kammeraadfinancial. No luck at What the Font, but there were some that were close. You can try yourself with the image below. Good luck!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131207043257im_/http:/typophile.com/files/kf_logo_5952.gif)
